actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To remove certain railroads owned and operated by the State of New York from the coverage of the Railway Labor Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railway Labor Act to remove from its coverage any railroad owned and operated by the State of New York through its Metropolitan Transit Authority.

titles.title: To remove certain railroads owned and operated by the State of New York from the coverage of the Railway Labor Act.
